systems.name: Garage User Interface System
systems.description: The system governing interactions within the Tank Garage interface.
systems.mechanics: Players can view, sort, and customize tanks using various UI elements such as bars, icons, and buttons.
systems.objectives: To provide an intuitive and efficient way for players to manage their tanks and decorations.
interactions: Clicking on 'Wrap bar' displays wrap decorations.
Sorting buttons allow filtering tanks by class.
systems.source_note: Described in the user flow diagram and multiple tables detailing UI components.

systems.name: Sorting Logic System
systems.description: System that determines the order in which tanks and decorations are displayed.
systems.mechanics: Items are sorted based on ownership status, currency type, and cost.
systems.objectives: To prioritize owned items and affordable options for players.
interactions: Owned items appear before unowned ones.
Gold-based items are prioritized over Diamond-based ones.
systems.source_note: Discussed in the context of sorting logic and table structures.

logic_rules.description: Items that the player already owns are displayed before unowned items.
logic_rules.effect: Owned items appear at the top of the list.
logic_rules.source_note: Mentioned in the sorting logic discussion.

logic_rules.description: Items are sorted by currency type, with Gold-based items appearing before Diamond-based ones.
logic_rules.trigger: Player views available decorations or tanks.
logic_rules.effect: Gold-based items are listed before Diamond-based ones.
logic_rules.source_note: Part of the sorting logic described in the context.
